<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aeon Resonance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3022) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 240 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Runelord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=103)

**Prerequisites**
[Embed Aeon Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=3021)

</column>

---

You gain the resonant power of one embedded _[aeon stone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=407)_ as if it were placed in a [_wayfinder_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=470). While you can embed multiple _aeon stones_ in your flesh, you can gain the resonance power from only one embedded stone at a time, selected each day when you make your daily preparations.

**Special** At 8th level, you can take this feat again. If you do, you gain the resonance powers of up to four invested _aeon stones_ instead of only one.
name: Aeon Resonance
